relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I am in Greek Life. It's not national so it's not as big of a deal as at some other larger schools.
There's a very nice park just five minutes walk from campus.
Make sure you can afford the steep tuition.

The university has small class sizes which makes learning a much more enjoyable experience. The campus is beautiful and location is great. The food isn't that great, but hey, there's grocery stores near by.
pageTitle: Otterbein University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19187=I am hoping to attend Otterbein in the fall of 2012. When I visited, I absolutely loved it; Everyone was really friendly and seemed authentically interested in me and my plans. I would highly recommend!, 38081=So much! We have free movie nights at our local movie theater. Donut runs at 1:00 am. (Best donuts ever) Many organizations and clubs for everyone!, 125718=The biggest tradition that Otterbein has is 'donut runs'. There is a bakery in Uptown Westerville that opens at 1:30AM during the week, It's great after a long night of studying to run up to Schneider's and grab a fresh donut and a carton of milk for only $1!, 197484=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
